alert.note: Alert for Orange County Inland; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Diego County Inland Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 11 at 8:59PM PST until January 12 at 10:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 15 to 25 mph with local gusts to 45 mph. * WHERE...San Diego County Valleys, San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire and Orange County Inland Areas. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will gradually decrease in coverage tonight with the winds weakening through Wednesday morning.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Orange County Inland; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Diego County Inland Valleys
